cells.data:
Flutter has odd methods for accessing images.
I copied and pasted image into folder:


This is the same as in Android, so no big deal. But apparently with flutter it doesnâ€™t stop there:

In the file pubspec.yaml:
Added the following entry:

# To add assets to your application, add an assets section, like this:
# assets:
#  - images/a_dot_burr.jpeg
#  - images/a_dot_ham.jpeg
assets:
  - images/face.png

After that, I had to save the file then click on the following link:



Make sure to click on Packages get (Packages upgrade also works I think)
